Description of incident: LeapLab is being sued by the Federal Trade Commission for purchasing "payday loan applications of financially strapped consumers, and then sold that information to marketers whom it knew had no legitimate need for it". In another FTC case, Ideal Financial Solutions, used this information sold to them to withdraw millions of dollars from individual accounts without permission. More Information: http://krebsonsecurity.com/2014/12/payday-loan-network-sold-info-to-scam...
